channel.title: Comments on: Installing HOTPANTS on Mac OS X Snow Leopard

item.title: By: Taro
item.dc:creator: Taro
item.description:
Sorry for neglecting this blog. He still seems to have an old web site around:
http://www.astro.washington.edu/users/becker/v2.0/hotpants.html
You'll find his source code under Software -> C/C++ code.
item.content:encoded:
Sorry for neglecting this blog. He still seems to have an old web site around:

http://www.astro.washington.edu/users/becker/v2.0/hotpants.html

You’ll find his source code under Software -> C/C++ code.

item.title: By: Andreas Skielboe
item.dc:creator: Andreas Skielboe
item.description:
You have no idea how glad I am I found this post.
I couldn't figure out why I was getting the 'abort', but setting version[5] to version[7] fixed it for me.
Thank you so much!
Do you know if Andrew still keeps a public repository of Hotpants? The old links are broken..
item.content:encoded:
You have no idea how glad I am I found this post.

I couldn’t figure out why I was getting the ‘abort’, but setting version[5] to version[7] fixed it for me.

Thank you so much!

Do you know if Andrew still keeps a public repository of Hotpants? The old links are broken..
